Welcome to our To-Do list! This is where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing/etc. on the Pokéclicker Wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on a page, or have an idea of new material to be put on the wiki, feel free to either add it to this page or drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord].

We aim to have this page empty one day, but it won't be easy to do so unless everyone contributes a little.

Please do not delete tasks when completed. Write ('''DONE''') before it and move it to [[To-Do list#Completed tasks awaiting moderators|Completed tasks awaiting moderators]] so that one of the moderators can review and verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == == Categorized Tasks == These tasks are grouped with similar tasks for ease of navigation.

'''Page Creation''' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information. It can also be adding images to the wiki, or otherwise large undertakings of fairly blank pages. '''Finishing Touches''' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. '''Updating''' is for pages that were affected by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. '''Formatting''' is for pages that need to have the way that information is displayed on them changed. This can range from template changes, to changes in the general aesthetic of the page. === Page Creation === # Check/Update/Add all flow-charts on [[Regions|Regional Pages]] # Fix whatever is going wrong with [[Template:Berry]] # Make [[Template:Major Mechanics]] including [[Dock]], [[Pokémon Day Care]], [[Farm]], [[Underground]], and any others that could apply (Maybe Safari Zone, Flutes, Pokérus?) === Finishing Touches === #Add more info to the [[Genders]] page === Updating === # Update the pages affected by Galar update (including [[Galar]] page itself) like -> [[Route Statistics]], [[Dungeon Tokens]], and others. === Formatting === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so arduous (and such a low priority) that it is more of a dream to complete them. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # add Shiny Variants to the normal Pokémon and a way to swap between the images. This is something that's up to debate, as there's little use for it other than being something for us to do. == Completed tasks awaiting moderators ==
